title: permaban and report system.
body:
After being permabbaned, for flame, i created 14 different lol accounts, now i will ruin every game in which i partecipate and i will report every player who complains about me. since i get reported by feeders and trashers and i got permabnned i will do the same. it seems that real players only get the crap in this game.
after spending money on the account , restoring honor to lv2, you perma ban me for 3 placement games? definetly a policy that doesn't help real players who want to compete and climb. this is the reason why League is full of trashers.

i feel bad for every player that will get banned with my 14 fake accounts. tell riot to update their %%%%%%ed policy that tutelate trash players over real ones.

a big %%%% you for my money lost, now your player numbers will rose, and i will ensure every game is UNPLAYABLE.
a game in which the report of trashers count as much as real players, if you can't play and get reported u deserve it, but if you are 0-12 and report a teammate he gets banned anyway as if he ruined every game, like that 0-12 player. 
hell is coming.
of course this will happen in ranked

sorry not sorry.
